metadata.title: GLOBEC Data - West Coast Vancouver Island, 1997-1999
metadata.description: Water property measurements collected off the west coast of Vancouver Island, in support of the GLOBEC project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Studying the chemical and physical oceanographic properties of waters off the West Coast of Vancouver Island to examine how living marine resources are affected by variability of their physical environment.

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data are in electronic format, well backed up and well documented.
Risk of Loss: Low
Impact Justification: Does not affect a wide variety of users.
Impact of Loss: Low
Recommended Action: None

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: To be submitted to GLOBEC for limited release

Distribution liability: [unknown]

FGDC metadata date: 20080205

FGDC metadata standard: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata

FGDC metadata version: FGDC-STD-1998-1

Native data set environment: Expected Growth Rate: Null

Data quality - Logical consistency: CTD data processed using normal IOS processing procedures. Normal standardization of CTD instruments at IOS.
Data quality - Completeness: Dataset Complications: The accuracy of the CTD data may vary depending on the instruments used and whether collaborating data were collected for intercomparison purposes.  Guildline CTDs are standardized at IOS; Sea-Bird CTD`s are calibrated at Sea-Bird Electronics in Bellevue, Washington.
Electronic Data Complications: Null
Lineage - Process steps:
  1. Unknown

Distribution liability: [unknown]
Non-digital ordering: Hardcopy Original Exists: Y
Hardcopy Locations: Joseph Linguanti, Rm 1246, IOS
Hardcopy Description: Various log books, data reports, cruise reports, and data sheets.
Hardcopy Volume: Several hundred (entire archive)
Fees: Ask Custodian
